
snap(-3,-3,-3)

sky(1000,1000,1000)
fog(240,240,240) 
ground(230,230,230)

fadefrom(8500)

name(Rainbow Road)

nlaps(3)

set(10,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,0)p
